topic.title: How plugin developers are paid?
topic.p: Plugin developers are paid following the rules defined in the [Developer Agreement](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/legal/developer-agreement):

list.li: Up to 30 days after the end-of-the-month (so that all credit cards/etc. settlement periods pass before the payment.)
Paid only when it's more than 200$ (or 200â‚¬) to limit the number of transactions, paid on 31st December of every year even if it's less than 200$.
Paid upon a self-billing invoice issued by JetBrains (so that you don't need to generate it yourself every time, please see Developer Agreement for more information.)
Paid in US Dollar (USD) or EURO (EUR).
